title: I really enjoy those Chinese cartoons, anime I believe it is. But riot, stop.
body:
Ezreal is literally a cringe factory of anime quotes and I practically die from cringe whenever I play against him. 

Nobody yells the name of their attacks when they do them...unless you’re anime

Nobody has intense reflective moments when they make a mistake and VOICE THEM OUTLOUD (what!? I missed!!? Baka.....) ...unless you’re anime 

Nobody actually has hair like that....unless you’re anime 

I get it. I like those Chinese cartoons, too. Some of them are good shows, but it’s honestly a cringe fest watching you literally wish you were an anime company that releases it’s not. Please stop. 

You’ve been warned.
